-
Introduction -
BioNetGen is an application that allows you to create cellular reaction network models.
-
Bug List
There were no known bugs at the release of this version of BioNetGen. -

Lets learn about some Concepts used in BioNetGen

Concepts -
Let's look at the basic concepts involved with BioNetGen.
-
How Do I... -
New File -
This example Chapter is going to be extra long, so we can see what different sections look like.

p -
New Foo -
New containers can be created by clicking on the add container button on the Editor window's toolbar.
-
New components can be created by clicking on the add component button on the Editor window's toolbar.
-
New Bar -
Edges are easily added. In the editor window press the add edge button on the toolbar. Pressing the add edge button places BioNetGen into add edge mode. Click on a the first component you would like to link with an edge then click on the second component. An edge will be created between the two comonents. Multiple edges may be added by repeating this process.
-
Keep in mind that if a component forming the endpoint of an edge is deleted the edge with automatically be deleted as well. Edges may be deleted just like any other element in the editor window by pressing the erase button on the toolbar while the edge is highlighted.
-
Another paragraph just to explore the underlying XML help document format.

Species -
What is a species, how are species created and manipulated.
